Name: Risotto
Description: Fry onions. He should soften, but not brown.Add rice and meat and fry for 2-3 minutes, stirring constantly. Grains should be saturated with oil and become translucent. Add water. Water must be hot, but not boiling. It takes about 20-25 minutes to cook rice. The rice grains should remain slightly stiff, but the risotto itself should have a creamy consistency. If it turns out to be a little dry, pour more water.
